plot: A fustrated man plays lousy games and points out their flaws, and usually interacts with characters from other video games.
plot_en: A fustrated man plays lousy games and points out their flaws, and usually interacts with characters from other video games.
plot_es: A fustrated man plays lousy games and points out their flaws, and usually interacts with characters from other video games.
title: The Irate Gamer
